relevant_findings.sensation: Markedly diminished in both legs from the toes to above the knees for vibration and temperature.
relevant_findings.deep_tendon_reflexes: 1+ and symmetric at the patellae, absent at the soleus.
relevant_findings.additional_findings: Unable to stand without assistance. Two firm, nontender subcutaneous nodules in the left submandibular area.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive involvement of sensory and motor function leading to weakness in both legs.
